mapper.select: select Emp_Id, waybill_id, md_id, md_collect_money, md_type, md_balance, md_details, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Outlets_Id, pg_id from lms.fi_money_detailed where md_id = #{mdId}

select Emp_Id, waybill_id, md_id, md_collect_money, md_type, md_balance, md_details, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Outlets_Id, pg_id from lms.fi_money_detailed limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into lms.fi_money_detailed(Emp_Id, waybill_id, md_collect_money, md_type, md_balance, md_details, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Outlets_Id, pg_id) values (#{empId}, #{waybillId}, #{mdCollectMoney}, #{mdType}, #{mdBalance}, #{mdDetails}, #{addname}, #{addtime}, #{updatename}, #{updatetime}, #{deletename}, #{deletetime}, #{timeliness}, #{outletsId}, #{pgId})

insert into lms.fi_money_detailed(Emp_Id, waybill_id, md_collect_money, md_type, md_balance, md_details, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Outlets_Id, pg_id) values
(#{entity.empId}, #{entity.waybillId}, #{entity.mdCollectMoney}, #{entity.mdType}, #{entity.mdBalance}, #{entity.mdDetails}, #{entity.addname}, #{entity.addtime}, #{entity.updatename}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.deletename}, #{entity.deletetime}, #{entity.timeliness}, #{entity.outletsId}, #{entity.pgId})

insert into lms.fi_money_detailed(Emp_Id, waybill_id, md_collect_money, md_type, md_balance, md_details, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Outlets_Id, pg_id) values
(#{entity.empId}, #{entity.waybillId}, #{entity.mdCollectMoney}, #{entity.mdType}, #{entity.mdBalance}, #{entity.mdDetails}, #{entity.addname}, #{entity.addtime}, #{entity.updatename}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.deletename}, #{entity.deletetime}, #{entity.timeliness}, #{entity.outletsId}, #{entity.pgId})
on duplicate key update Emp_Id = values(Emp_Id) , waybill_id = values(waybill_id) , md_collect_money = values(md_collect_money) , md_type = values(md_type) , md_balance = values(md_balance) , md_details = values(md_details) , AddName = values(AddName) , ADDTIME = values(ADDTIME) , UpdateName = values(UpdateName) , UpdateTime = values(UpdateTime) , DeleteName = values(DeleteName) , DeleteTime = values(DeleteTime) , TimeLiness = values(TimeLiness) , Outlets_Id = values(Outlets_Id) , pg_id = values(pg_id)
mapper.update:
update lms.fi_money_detailed
Emp_Id = #{empId},
waybill_id = #{waybillId},
md_collect_money = #{mdCollectMoney},
md_type = #{mdType},
md_balance = #{mdBalance},
md_details = #{mdDetails},
AddName = #{addname},
ADDTIME = #{addtime},
UpdateName = #{updatename},
UpdateTime = #{updatetime},
DeleteName = #{deletename},
DeleteTime = #{deletetime},
TimeLiness = #{timeliness},
Outlets_Id = #{outletsId},
pg_id = #{pgId},
where md_id = #{mdId}
